item.name: Heart Bloodstone of Arazni
entries: The {@i Heart Bloodstone of Arazni} represents protection. While holding the {@i Heart Bloodstone}, you can feel the gentle rhythm of a beating heart within the jar.

entries.name: Activate—Raise Jar
entries: You hold the jar aloft, and a nimbus of crimson energy surrounds your body. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Activate—Proclaim Resilience
entries.requirements: You worship {@deity Arazni|DM} or are favored by her
entries: You make a loud and clear proclamation of your resilience (such as “I will not fall to the hands of my enemies!”). You gain resistance to void damage equal to your level until the beginning of your next turn.

destruction: The {@i Heart Bloodstone} turns to dust if a worshipper of {@deity Arazni|DM} is slain while holding the {@i Bloodstone} and cursing her name. Any breathing creature within 10 feet of the jar inhales the choking dust, taking {@damage 4d6} void damage (DC 28 basic Fortitude save). On a failure, the creature also takes 4 {@condition persistent damage|PC1|persistent void damage} (8 {@condition persistent damage|PC1|persistent void damage} on a critical failure).

item.name: Liver Bloodstone of Arazni
entries: The {@i Liver Bloodstone of Arazni} represents confidence. While holding the {@i Liver Bloodstone}, you feel more certain in your abilities.

entries.name: Activate—Embolden
entries.trigger: You critically succeed on an attack roll
entries: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 round.

entries.name: Activate—Arazni's Fervor
entries.requirements: You worship {@deity Arazni|DM} or are favored by her
entries: You hold the {@i Liver Bloodstone} aloft, and the Bloodstone glows with crimson light, filling you and your allies with {@deity Arazni|DM|Arazni’s} wrath. The {@i Liver Bloodstone} casts {@spell bless|PC1}. For the next minute, you can use a free action at the beginning of each of your turns to increase the spell’s emanation radius by 10 feet. You can’t increase the emanation’s radius in any other way.

destruction: The {@i Liver Bloodstone} melts into a puddle of poison if a worshipper of {@deity Arazni|DM} willingly submerges the {@i Bloodstone} in a lethal {@trait contact} or {@trait ingested||consumed} poison, then licks the {@i Bloodstone} clean. Each creature in a 15-foot emanation is exposed to the poison that destroyed the {@i Bloodstone}, as if they’d touched or consumed that poison.

item.name: Lung Bloodstone of Arazni
entries: The {@i Lung Bloodstone of Arazni} represents suffering. While you carry the {@i Lung Bloodstone}, you gain the ability to turn your pain into a weapon against your enemies.

entries.name: Activate—Strength Through Pain
entries: You allow the pain to resonate within you, making you stronger. You gain a +1 status bonus to your next {@action Strike|PC1} or spell attack before the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Activate—Admonish
entries.requirements: You worship {@deity Arazni|DM} or are favored by her
entries: You point your finger at a creature within 60 feet that has wronged you, and you verbally admonish them. The creature takes {@damage 1d4} mental damage for every level you have (basic Will save against your class DC). On a failed save, the creature is also {@condition stunned|PC1|stunned 1} ({@condition stunned|PC1|stunned 3} on a critical failure).

destruction: To destroy the {@i Lung Bloodstone}, a worshipper of {@deity Arazni|DM} must willingly impale themself with the Bloodstone’s horned figurehead, dealing themselves {@damage 3d6} piercing damage and {@damage 3d6} {@condition persistent damage|PC1|persistent bleed damage}. The {@i Lung Bloodstone} then evaporates into a cloud of noxious vapors, as {@spell toxic cloud|PC1} (DC 28), that follows the creature that destroyed the {@i Bloodstone} for its duration.

item.name: Spleen Bloodstone of Arazni
entries: The {@i Spleen Bloodstone of Arazni} represents freedom. Holding the {@i Spleen Bloodstone} makes you feel as if no bonds can contain you.

entries.name: Activate—Sure Footing
entries: You {@action Step|PC1} or {@action Stride|PC1}, treating both difficult and greater difficult terrain as normal terrain during the movement. For each additional action you spend, you can {@action Step|PC1} or {@action Stride|PC1} again with the same benefits. If you have a climb or fly Speed, you can instead {@action Climb|PC1} or {@action Fly|PC1} respectively.

entries.name: Activate—Break Bonds
entries.requirements: You worship {@deity Arazni|DM} or are favored by her
entries: The {@condition confused|PC1}, {@condition controlled|PC1}, {@condition grabbed|PC1}, {@condition immobilized|PC1}, {@condition paralyzed|PC1}, {@condition petrified|PC1}, and {@condition restrained|PC1} conditions, as well as any Speed penalties affecting you, immediately end unless the effect is {@trait magical} and of 12th level or higher. You can use this ability even if your actions are restricted or otherwise decided for you (such as being {@condition confused|PC1} or {@condition controlled|PC1}).

destruction: If a worshipper of {@deity Arazni|DM} willingly gains the {@condition controlled|PC1} condition or becomes {@trait undead} while holding the {@i Spleen Bloodstone}, the {@i Bloodstone} explodes, dealing {@damage 10d6} force damage to all creatures in a 20-foot emanation (DC 28 basic Reflex save).

item.name: Chalice of Ozem
entries: This ruby-studded dawnsilver chalice can’t be harmed by any substance it holds, no matter how caustic. Furthermore, liquid placed within the {@i Chalice of Ozem} never spills unless its carrier chooses to do so (using a single action with the {@trait concentrate} trait).

entries.name: Activate—Iomedae's Blessing
entries: You hold the chalice and call out {@deity Iomedae|PC1|Iomedae’s} name. The chalice casts {@spell dispelling globe|PC1} with a +19 modifier to its counteract check.

destruction: If the {@i Chalice of Ozem} is filled with {@deity Iomedae|PC1|Iomedae’s} blood and {@deity Arazni|DM} drinks from it, it shatters.
